h3_title: Secret - Defeat the Stone Vanguard with the Shigandang
content: However, if he performs a larger leap into the air, he can summon several rock pillars in front of him when he slams his fists into the ground, making a direct retreat backward inadvisable! The good news is this move will often require him to pull his arms out of the ground after detonating the pillars, giving you plenty of time to hit him with big attacks.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Shigandang.md', within the main section titled 'Shigandang', specifically from the subsection 'Shigandang Boss Fight and Guide' and the sub-subsection 'Secret - Defeat the Stone Vanguard with the Shigandang'.
The content is as follows:
However, if he performs a larger leap into the air, he can summon several rock pillars in front of him when he slams his fists into the ground, making a direct retreat backward inadvisable! The good news is this move will often require him to pull his arms out of the ground after detonating the pillars, giving you plenty of time to hit him with big attacks.
